pymultifracs.mfa.mf_analysis¶

pymultifracs.mfa.mf_analysis(wt_coefs, wt_leaders, j2_eff, j1, weighted, n_cumul, q)¶

Perform multifractal analysis, given wavelet coefficients.

Parameters
wt_coefsMultiResolutionQuantity

Wavelet coefs

wt_leadersMultiResolutionQuantity | None

Wavelet leaders. Set to None if using wavelet coef formalism.

j2_effint

Effective maximum scalec

j1int

Minimum scale

weightedbool

Whether the linear regressions will be weighted

n_cumulint

Number of cumulants computed

qndarray, shape (n_exponents,)

List of q values used in the multifractal analysis

Returns
MFractalData

The output of the multifractal analysis
